title: This is the new heaven for Bitcoin, Ethereum and Ripple (XRP) Hodlers: This country cuts Taxes on Crypto
description: Slovakia’s new legislation significantly reduces taxes on cryptocurrency transactions, attracting Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Ripple (XRP) hodlers. The move aims to position Slovakia as a leading destination for crypto investments, fostering adoption and stimulating the growth of the digital asset industry. Slovakia has taken a significant stride towards becoming a sought-after destination for cryptocurrency investors. According [...]

title: Bitcoin Maxi: ‘We Don’t Need BTC ETFs,’ SEC Focus on Eliminating XRP, ADA
description:
In a Twitter outburst, Max Keiser, a well-known Bitcoin maximalist, expressed his indifference toward the Securities and Exchange Commission’s (SEC) position on Bitcoin ETFs. Keiser boldly claimed that Bitcoin was untouchable and urged SEC Chairman Gary Gensler to focus on eliminating what he called ‘shitcoins,’ which included Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), Binance Coin […]

The post Bitcoin Maxi: ‘We Don’t Need BTC ETFs,’ SEC Focus on Eliminating XRP, ADA appeared first on Coin Edition.
